rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with wide doorways and level thresholds. Includes reception area to greet guests.
Spacious living room designed in colonial style featuring traditional elements; ample natural light from West-facing windows, with seating arrangement ensuring Vastu compliance.
Modern dining area adjacent to living room. Open kitchen layout allows for interaction during meals.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and colonial accents. Designed for ease of movement with wheelchair accessibility in mind.
Cozy guest bedroom with colonial detailing. Includes en-suite bathroom designed for accessible use.
Accessible bathroom adjacent to guest bedroom featuring grab bars and wheelchair-friendly fixtures.
Well-ventilated gym with ample space for equipment. Includes storage and mirrored walls; designed with accessibility features.
Home office/study area designed in colonial style to suit work-from-home needs, incorporating both functionality and aesthetics.
Utility room for laundry, storage, and maintenance, ensuring smooth operations while maintaining aesthetic colonial style.

openings.details: Wide door with ramp access. Incorporates security features including a vestibule area.
Large, West-facing windows to harness natural light in line with Vastu principles; includes operable window options for ventilation.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Area
openings.details: Wide doorway ensuring smooth movement between spaces.
Functional window for additional light, placed according to Vastu guidelines to enhance energy flow.
